item.title: 2017/18 season confirmed
item.dc:creator: Andy Melville
item.description:
We've finalized the new lineup for the 2017/18 season, which you can find here.

The Zonita volunteers are gathering at the Queens Head at 7pm on Thursday August 17th to discuss the upcoming season. If you would like to come along and meet us, you're very welcome.

item.title: 2017/18 season is open for ideas
item.dc:creator: Glenn Hutchings
item.description:
The Spring 2017 season is now over. We hope you'll agree there were some excellent movies!

We are reviewing our Autumn 2017 and Spring 2018 movie line up, both matinee and evening. All ideas and suggestions are welcome, whether a classic, thriller, hollywood, or musical. Why not write and let us know? You can either leave a comment on this page, or email us at info@zonita.org.uk.

item.title: February movies confirmed
item.dc:creator: Andy Melville
item.description:
We're pleased to announce the following movies for February 2017:

  • Matinee: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang
  • Evening: Eddie The Eagle

See here for more details.
